message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm offering it to you for $1,350,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1,200,000?
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial offer.  How about we meet halfway at $1,275,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still working within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $1,250,000?
